### 2. **Toast Notifications** ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (USER EXPERIENCE)

### 3. **Charts & Analytics** ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (BUSINESS VALUE)

### 5. **Confirmation Dialogs** ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê (SAFETY)
